thread.section_title: 8Seasons 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 8Seasons 的点评意见 | 8seasons.com
thread.title: Laxgirl12

author: Laxgirl12
title: Laxgirl12
text: I have purchased jewellery supplies from 8 Seasons many times over the last year. They have great customer service and a great range of products. I have ordered about 50 times. One time my package didn't come so they sent me a new one for free which was nice of them because it wasn't there fault it was the fault of the post office. If something arrived defective they were happy to help and the issue was resolved quickly. Most of the time the products are perfect though. They are my trusted jewellery making supplier.
